snippet: The new chancellor of the Texas A&M University System is a former state comptroller. Just the latest example of what a university chancellor’s job is really about: raising money.
lead_paragraph: The new chancellor of the Texas A&M University System is a former state comptroller. Just the latest example of what a university chancellor’s job is really about: raising money.

headline.main: Not the Academic Type? No Problem. You’re Hired.
headline.print_headline: Not the Academic Type? No Problem. You’re Hired.
